Reviews.Title: its slow but okay
Reviews.Author: sara
Reviews.Content: the wifi is extremely slow and it goes in and out.. meaning you'll be connected for about 3min and then your after you wait a minute for a page to load you'll find out your no longer connected to wifi. Also reconnecting to wifi also requires you to either just wait it out about 30 min and try again or power down the phone and reconnect. I bought this for GPS, which doesn't work without data plan, and email which i can rarely read due to the time it takes to connect and reconnect to wifi. I dont have a data plan so it may affect the speed.. but make sure your provider offers BIS or you can't get a data plan for this phone. FYI page plus doesn't offer data for this phone (no BIS) and verizon's only prepaid option is $80 a month. I wouldn't buy this phone unless you get a BIS data plan.. for me its worthless
